Session 23 - 2/2/2026

Session Notes

Source: Campaign Source Notes.

Highlights

  • Bart:
  • Chad claims reba
  • Sketchy house we are gonna go to (Lady Fiona)
  • Chadlius
  • Chad claims reba
  • Chad made quite the impression on her sons the night before
  • Wachter men don’t like their mother because they won’t inherit anything and their mom doesn’t like them. The family has been there for YEARS.
  • Fiona hates the Burgomeister bc he’s anti-Strahd. Fiona has been having increasingly large gatherings of townsfolk in the cellar.
  • We go to Lady Fiona’s house and knock on the door to be admitted. The tiefling at the door lets us in immediately and we go sit down in the kitchen/lounge
  • Children or elves in green pajamas with conical hats and pom poms on the wallpaper. They could either be screaming in terror or giggling while playing. In their hands could be candle or knife. Either way, terrifying.
  • We see Ernst in the lounge.
  • Executive decisions were made. Reba is in Chadlius’s inventory and he will attune to it. Kiv, Rictavio, and some of the Keepers of the Feather would clean up the dead bodies while Ismark and Urwin watched over Ilyna. After some debate, C...
  • Left unsupervised, the party began to cautiously wander around Wachterhaus. Noises from above and below presented a choice: investigate the ritual happening in the cellar or the creepy cat-girl upstairs. Both stimuli were determined to b...
  • In the cellar, Bart found a room that was empty other than 4 cots with slumbering vampire spawn on them and a deeper level in which cultists had just finished a ritual: opening a teleportation circle for Count Strahd Von Zarovich.
